introduce_product: Based on the successful ‘Chaton’ style design of the Slim Marine series, Baby-G introduces four new timepieces with elegant and tough styling. White resin band Analog and digital watch with a white face.
list_specification_product:
World Time 
29 time zones (48 cities), city code display, daylight saving on/off

5 Independent Daily Alarms
Hourly Time Signal
1/100 second stopwatch  
Measuring capacity: 59’59.99”
Measuring modes: Elapsed time, split time, 1st-2nd place times

Countdown Timer
Measuring unit: 1 second
Countdown range: 1 minute to 24 hours (1-minute increments and 1-hour increments)
Others: Auto-repeat, time-up alarm
